page.title: 01CENTRAL BOLTON
page.content: Our area,Heaton and The Town Centre is at the heart of Bolton Metrolpolitan Borough.Bolton offers much as a place of historic interest,a shopping centre and an arts and entertainment centre. Textiles,motor vehicle components and engineering have been the major industries in the area but these, particularly the cotton industry, have suffered a recent decline.Many of the cotton mills have been demolished and less than half of those remaining have a single occupier. About a third have multiple occupancy and the others are vacant or underused. Until recently many of the houses near the town centre were high density terraces over 60 years old. Now the area is being modernised.Houses are being renovated or replaced and the old grid pattern of streets is being replaced by cul-de-sacs
